web.title: SNPI (Seminar Nasional Planter Indonesia) 2024
web.desc: This is an application that I developed with my team using Laravel for a client. SNPI (Seminar Nasional Planter Indonesia) 2024 is a website designed to provide information and registration for the national seminar event. The platform allows users to access event details, register for participation, and stay updated with the latest announcements related to the seminar in a user-friendly manner. Click <a href="https://ips-planter.or.id/snpi2024/" target="_blank" >here</a > to check the web.

web.title: Hai Sawit Website
web.desc: This is an application that I developed with my team using Laravel & Flutter for a client. Haisawit is an application that provides comprehensive information about palm oil plantations. The application is designed to help users access data, training, palm oil products, and updates related to palm oil plantations easily and efficiently. Click <a href="https://haisawit.co.id/" target="_blank" >here</a > to check the web.

web.title: Elisa Lawyer
web.desc: This is an application that I developed using Laravel for a client. Elisa Lawyer is a legal service application designed to connect users with professional lawyers. The application allows users to easily find legal services, book consultations, and access useful legal resources in a simple and efficient manner. Click <a href="https://elisalawyer.com/" target="_blank" >here</a > to check the web.

mobile.title: Makna Quran
mobile.desc: This is an application that I developed myself using Flutter. Makna Quran is a digital Quran application that provides the full Quran text along with translations and tafsir. The application is designed to help users understand the meaning of Quranic verses easily and conveniently.

mobile.desc: This is an application that I developed myself using Flutter. This application is a collection of news from various media so that application users can read lots of news in various media in one application.
